fields.description: To support high performance file formats, I'd like to propose that we move the minimal set of classes that are required to integrate with Hive into a new module named "storage-api". This module will include VectorizedRowBatch, the various ColumnVector classes, and the SARG classes. It will form the start of an API that high performance storage formats can use to integrate with Hive. Both ORC and Parquet can use the new API to support vectorization and SARGs without performance destroying shims.
